posts.post_title: FS/FT: T206 Cobb psa2, Matty sgc20, Speaker psa1
posts.post_content:
Up for sale are either dupe i upgraded or grades i don't like...prices are fair/firm as that's what i pretty much have in them...looking for other t206 HOF action shots like cobb, young, johnson, lajoie, chance, tinker etc.  lmk if you have something and we can work something out, i'm reasonable and expect the same.

prices are shipped check/mo.

t206 cobb bat off psa 2--$625   CARD ON EBAY NOW
t206 speaker psa 1 -- $$OLD
